name: NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
desc: A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary to interact with an assistive app.

items.name: func accessibilityFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element’s frame in screen coordinates.

items.name: func accessibilityParent() -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element’s parent in the accessibility hierarchy.

items.name: func isAccessibilityFocused() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the accessibility element has the keyboard focus.
